hero.createStandoutResume: Create a standout resume that catches employers' attention and passes ATS systems with ease. Powered by AI for the best results.

upload.title: Update Your Resume
upload.description: Update your existing resume and we'll extract the information to help you build a better one.

tips.title: Tips for best results:
tips.format: Use a well-formatted resume with clear sections
tips.text: Ensure text is selectable (not scanned images)
tips.sections: Include standard sections like Experience, Education, Skills

coverLetter.title: Cover Letter Generator
coverLetter.description: Generate a personalized cover letter based on your resume and job description
coverLetter.noResumeDataDescription: You need to create a resume first before generating a cover letter.
